sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.description: We thank our sponsors for their invaluable support in making these events possible.

about.title: About Saada
about.description: Sadaa is your ultimate destination for purchasing tickets to a variety of events and occasions, including concerts, sports shows, and cultural festivals. We believe that every event is an opportunity to spread joy, and we provide an easy-to-use interface with secure payment options, allowing you to book your ticket quickly and easily.

whoWeAre.part2: Our Mission: To provide an easy and secure ticket purchasing experience, ensuring high quality and excellent service, enabling our visitors to enjoy the best events and occasions, and helping to create memorable moments that last a lifetime.

whyChooseUs.part1: We offer an easy user interface, variety of events, secure shopping experience, ability to add events.

ourVision.part2: Our Vision: To be the leading platform that provides tickets for the best events, contributing to creating moments filled with happiness and joy for all our visitors, and enhancing the value of shared experiences
ourVision.part1: Our Vision: To be the leading platform that provides tickets for the best events, contributing to creating moments filled with happiness and joy for all our visitors, and enhancing the value of shared experiences

howToSetNameAndDate.question: How to set the event name & date?
howToSetNameAndDate.answer: Event names and dates can be set while creating or editing an event from the organizer‚Äôs dashboard.

howToSetPrice.question: Set price for ticket?
howToSetPrice.answer: Ticket prices can be added during the event creation process or updated later from the event management tab.

howToBuyTicket.question: How to Buy a Ticket?
howToBuyTicket.answer: To get your ticket, visit the events portal, select your desired event, and click on the 'Book Now' button. Complete the payment process, and your ticket will instantly appear and be sent to your email.

howToCreateEvent.answer: To add your events, please contact us, and we will add the event on your behalf and assign organizers to it. Kindly provide the account details of the organizers to complete the setup successfully.
howToCreateEvent.question: How to make a new event?

We believe that every event is an opportunity to spread joy, and we provide an easy-to-use interface with secure payment options, allowing you to book your ticket quickly and easily.
